content: This famous ship sank on her maiden voyage in April 1912 after hitting an iceberg. What is the name of this ship?

The ship you're referring to is the RMS Titanic. It was one of the largest and most luxurious passenger ships of its time, but tragically, it sank on its maiden voyage from Southampton to New York City after hitting an iceberg in the North Atlantic Ocean. The disaster resulted in the loss of more than 1,500 lives, and it remains one of the most infamous shipwrecks in history.
